channel.title: Glitch or somthing in DavidScape 508
channel.description:
ok i am an admin on the server got all 99 skills and whip and all the stuff but im at gwd triyn 2 kill monsters i equipped rune c bow and dragon bolts e and i click attack but it just goes upto the monster and kicks why? its only with c bows i tried crystal it worked...
weird on other servers it worked
PLEASE HELP! thanks
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2009, 03:08:05 am[/size][hr]oh another thing i think this is more hard to fix but everytime im at gwd when i go to kill some avansies i will auto logout or the client will go blank with a giant code in the client cmd saying at the bottom shut down:clean=true or somthin and in the server cmd it will say [owned] Unhandled Packet: 129 oh yea and at the bottom of the client cmd above the shutdown it says error_game_crash
PLEASE HELP

item.title: Glitch or somthing in DavidScape 508
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:5, topic:279915”][quote author=MrFaranCool link=topic=369365.msg2796279#msg2796279 date=1243092529]
He said DavidScape you nubcake…
[/quote]

Davidscape IS BASED OFF BULBY. learn your facts.

Anyways, I have no clue what to do for the 1st one.

And the 2nd one, I think it might be in 1st click something, dunno[/quote]

u r stupid.

GWD was never in bulby. Learn your facts. And 508s dont have “firstclicking” like 317s.

Read full topic
